definitions: the property or quality of being black in color

examples.text: it restores gray hair to blackness

shortDefinitions: property or quality of being black

definitions: complete darkness; the absence of any light

examples.text: the entire house was plunged into pitch blackness

definitions: the fact or state of belonging to any human group having dark-colored skin

examples.text: my experiences have made me far more aware of my blackness than ever before
she holds that position not because of her blackness, but her effectiveness

shortDefinitions: fact of belonging to any human group having dark-coloured skin

definitions: the quality or character associated with black people

examples.text: the blackness of his poetry is an inextricable aspect of his subject matter

definitions: a state characterized by despair or depression

examples.text: there is a little hope amid the blackness of his life
the absolute depths of blackness and morbidity

shortDefinitions: state characterized by tragedy or disaster

definitions: a state or condition of being evil or wicked

examples.text: the blackness of the human heart through the atrocities of war

shortDefinitions: state or conditrion of being evil or wicked
